# TurtleROC Demo

This vignette demonstrates how to use TurtleROC to create interactive ROC curve visualizations.

## Example Data

    library(TurtleROC)
    df <- data.frame(
      score = c(0.9, 0.85, 0.8, 0.7, 0.6),
      actual = c(1, 0, 1, 0, 1)
    )

## Turtle Path ROC Plot

    TurtlePathWidget(df)

## Shiny Example

    library(shiny)
    ui <- fluidPage(
      TurtlePathWidgetOutput('rocWidget', width='600px', height='600px')
    )
    server <- function(input, output, session) {
      output$rocWidget <- renderTurtlePathWidget({
        TurtlePathWidget(df)
      })
    }
    shinyApp(ui, server)
